verses.text: And it came to pass, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* would take \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* into \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* by a \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w*, that \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* from \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, \w Tarry|strong="H3427"\w* here, I pray thee; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*. And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \add unto him, As\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, and \add as\add* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, I will not \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* thee. So they went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that \add were\add* at \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thou that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w* from thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Yea, I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \add it;\add* hold ye your \w peace|strong="H2814"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, \w tarry|strong="H3427"\w* here, I pray thee; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, and \add as\add* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, I will not \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* thee. So they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that \add were\add* at \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w came|strong="H5066"\w* to \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thou that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w* from thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Yea, I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \add it;\add* hold ye your \w peace|strong="H2814"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Tarry|strong="H3427"\w*, I pray thee, here; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, and \add as\add* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, I will not \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* thee. And they \w two|strong="H8147"\w* went \w on|strong="H3212"\w*.

And \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* to \w view|strong="H5048"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*: and they \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.\f + \fr 2.7 \ft to view: Heb. in sight, or, over against\f*

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* his \w mantle|strong="H0155"\w*, and wrapped \add it\add* \w together|strong="H1563"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and they were \w divided|strong="H2673"\w* hither and thither, so that they \w two|strong="H8147"\w* went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* on \w dry|strong="H2724"\w* ground.

¶ And it came to pass, when they were gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, that \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, \w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* what I shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for thee, before I be taken \w away|strong="H3947"\w* from thee. And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I pray thee, let a \w double|strong="H8147"\w* \w portion|strong="H6310"\w* of thy \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* be upon me.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou hast \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* a hard \w thing|strong="H7185"\w*: \add nevertheless\add*, if thou \w see|strong="H7200"\w* me \add when I am\add* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* from thee, it shall be so unto thee; but if not, it shall not be \add so\add*.\f + \fr 2.10 \ft Thou hast…: Heb. Thou hast done hard in asking\f*

And it came to pass, as they \w still|strong="H1980"\w* went \w on|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w talked|strong="H1696"\w*, that, behold, \add there appeared\add* a \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w parted|strong="H6504"\w* them \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w asunder|strong="H0996"\w*; and \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by a \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w* into \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

¶ And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and he \w cried|strong="H6817"\w*, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* thereof. And he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* him no more: and he took \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of his own \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* them in \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7168"\w*.

He took \w up|strong="H7311"\w* also the \w mantle|strong="H0155"\w* of \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* that \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* from him, and went \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by the \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*;\f + \fr 2.13 \ft bank: Heb. lip\f*

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w mantle|strong="H0155"\w* of \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* that \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* from him, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Where \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*? and when he also had \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, they \w parted|strong="H2673"\w* hither and thither: and \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* went \w over|strong="H5674"\w*.

And when the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* which \add were\add* to view at \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* him, they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* doth \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* on \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*. And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* themselves to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* before him.

¶ And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold now, there \w be|strong="H3426"\w* with thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w strong|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*; let them \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, we pray thee, and \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w*: lest peradventure the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath taken him \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* him upon \w some|strong="H0259"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, or into \w some|strong="H0259"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall not \w send|strong="H7971"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft strong…: Heb. sons of strength\f*\f + \fr 2.16 \ft some mountain: Heb. one of the mountains\f*

And when they \w urged|strong="H6484"\w* him till he was \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Send|strong="H7971"\w*. They \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* therefore \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*; and they \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, but \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him not.

And when they came \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to him, (for he \w tarried|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*,) he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Did I not \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* not?

¶ And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, Behold, I pray thee, the \w situation|strong="H4186"\w* of this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add is\add* \w pleasant|strong="H2896"\w*, as my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w*: but the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \add is\add* \w naught|strong="H7451"\w*, and the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w barren|strong="H7921"\w*.\f + \fr 2.19 \ft barren: Heb. causing to miscarry\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Bring|strong="H3947"\w* me a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w cruse|strong="H6746"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* therein. And they \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add* to him.

And he went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w spring|strong="H4161"\w* of the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* in there, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I have \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* these \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*; there shall not be from thence any more \w death|strong="H4194"\w* or \w barren|strong="H7921"\w* \add land\add*.

So the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* were \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, according to the \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*.

¶ And he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from thence unto \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*: and as he was going \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, there came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w children|strong="H5288"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w mocked|strong="H7046"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, thou bald \w head|strong="H7142"\w*; go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, thou bald \w head|strong="H7142"\w*.

And he \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w back|strong="H0310"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* on them, and \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* them in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And there came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* she \w bears|strong="H1677"\w* out of the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w*, and \w tare|strong="H1234"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w* of them.
And he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* from thence to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, and from thence he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.
